ojc.bain.misc

Class Ziggurat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • ojc.bain.misc.Ziggurat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Ziggurat
extends java.util.Random
    This class implements the ziggurat algorithm for normal distributed random numbers as provided by George Marsaglia and Wai Wan Tsang in 2000.
    Author:
    Andreas Schouten (andreas@schouten-blog.de)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
